projects.title: Custom Spotify Playlist Builder
projects.description: Built with React and combines multiple components, interactive search functionality, and requests to the Spotify API. Click on the links below and try it out!

projects.title: Boutique E-Commerce Store
projects.description: A functional e-commerce website where users can purchase boutique bananas while critiquing designer markets. Click the link below to view project in GitHub.

projects.title: Company website Park Suppplies and Playgrounds
projects.description: Part of the team that created and managed company websites using WordPress and Elementor Pro. Also maintaining and optimising UI and UX.

projects.title: Restaurant Recommendation Website
projects.description: Ravenous is a restaurant recommendation website that empowers users to search for local businesses based on their location and keywords utilising the YELP API.

projects.title: Digital Tabletop Game - Dungeons & Developers
projects.description: A group project with the goal of rolling some dice and getting some funny outcomes relevant to the developer experience. Add your players and take turns rolling to see who's the best dev in the dungeon!

projects.category: DESIGN & ILLUSTRATION | ADOBE CREATIVE SUITE | FIGMA

projects.description: With a background in design and illustration, I have worked on a variety of projects from branding and marketing to illustration and animation. Click the link below to view my portfolio.

projects.title: Dev Blog
projects.description: The blog is where I share my insights and experiences about the projects I have worked on, current projects I am working through and my observations of dev life.
